name: ShadowStep
description:
ShadowStep was a school project made by Studio 19 at the University of Central Florida for a 6 week summer semester. Developed in Unreal Engine 4

ShadowStep follows the protagonist Jack, who uses his superhuman powers of diving through shadows in order to collect and steal valuable artifacts from museums, art galleries and mansions in order to add them to his personal collection. With a massive social media presence, Jack routinely tips off locations about his deviant plans in order to gain attention. Will Jack be able to locate these artifacts while evading the guards that are desperate to find him?
